bibl.title: T.C. Skeat and the Problem of Fiber Orientation in Codicological Reconstruction.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Short, modified version of: IDEM, T.C. Skeat, P64+67 and P4, and the Problem of Fibre Orientation in Codicological Reconstruction, NTS 53 (2007) pp. 582-604, 1 tabl., 3 figg. - Introduction. - Possible codicological reconstructions of P67 [P. Barc. Inv. 1 (= van Haelst 336 (1); LDAB 2936]. - Codicological reconstruction of P4 [P. Paris Bibl. Nat., Suppl. Gr. 1120 (= van Haelst 403; LDAB 2936)]. - Codex construction and copying. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
